creditline: Gift of Richard J. and Helen Lynch Cashman
description: lozenge-shaped box on raised foot; blue ground and interior; scrolling multi-colored flowers; central round medallion with pair of blue birds on a branch against a maroon ground
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [CHAIT GALLERIES/ Ch\'ien Long / Period / 1730-1795 A.D. / NEW YORK (partially obscured)]
title: Cloisonné box with cover
